Hi guys. This is an AWESOME game! what about insert a mini-game and a new structure in the Space Center for training and recruiting astronauts? Right now its just a list but I beleive could be funny to test ourselves the astronauts in the "training lab" . "Only the toughests Kerbalians should pass the tests! " (maybe with more skills besides courage and stupidity). I was thinking much of something "without" need of doing anything. I. e. you choose your recruits ( let's say 5 ) and put them into a centrifugal machine. The software should generate reactions (puke,fear ecc ) and give a feedback on astronauts assigning points You can have all training instruments as seen in the last video

Let me know!

Bye

Nice idea. I also would like to see something like a progression based training, e.g. when you get a docking maneuver done the kerbol(or maybe the autopilotcomputer) is able to do the maneuver on its own if you wish.
